abstract: Sen Tim Kaine sings praises of Democratic presidential candidate Hillary Rodham Clinton at rally in his home state of Virginia, clearest audition yet for role of vice presidential running mate; Clinton's aides do not expect final decision until after Republican National Convention.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Kaine, a contender to be Mrs. Clinton’s running mate, gave an enthusiastic introduction at her rally in Virginia, although some of his lines seemed to work better than others.

headline.main: In Audition With Hillary Clinton, Tim Kaine Nails Most of His Lines
headline.print_headline: In Audition With Clinton, Senator Nails His Lines

snippet: Mr. Kaine, a contender to be Mrs. Clinton’s running mate, gave an enthusiastic introduction at her rally in Virginia, although some of his lines seemed to work better than others....
